snippet: The director of operations for a Texas-based telecommunications company became interim prime minister of the Syrian opposition coalition.
abstract: Ghassan Hitto, director of operations for a Texas-based telecommunications company, became interim prime minister of the Syrian opposition coalition for less than four months but he has yet to return to Texas; he continues plotting how to fortify the opposition to Bashar al-Assad from the now permanent home in Istanbul that he shares with his newly relocated wife.
lead_paragraph: The director of operations for a Texas-based telecommunications company became interim prime minister of the Syrian opposition coalition.
